name: ballistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the way objects are shot or thrown through the air: The ammunition used in the gun owned by Mr Johnson were ballistically similar to those found at the crime scene. Electrons move ballistically in circular orbits around the nucleus and give off energy when they leap from one orbit to another.
More examplesFewer examplesA meteor streaked ballistically across the night sky. The bullets are ballistically linked to those used as ammunition by the enemy soldiers.
